originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of working with Heather Cooper from Compass for over a decade, and I am thrilled to share my exceptional experience with her. Heather has been my dedicated real estate agent for my condominium in Murray Hill, and her expertise and commitment have been truly remarkable.

Heather's knowledge of the Murray Hill real estate market is unparalleled. She consistently found me responsible and reliable tenants, ensuring that my property was well-cared for and providing me with consistent rental income. Her attention to detail and rigorous tenant screening process have given me peace of mind, knowing that my investment is in capable hands.

What sets Heather apart is her dedication to her clients. She is incredibly responsive, addressing any questions or concerns promptly. Her transparency and honesty have built a strong foundation of trust in our working relationship. I've always felt that she goes the extra mile to ensure my success as a landlord.

I wholeheartedly recommend Heather Cooper to anyone seeking a top-notch real estate agent in Murray Hill. Her professionalism, expertise, and unwavering dedication make her a standout choice, whether you are looking to buy, sell, or rent out your apartment. I look forward to continuing our successful collaboration for years to come.

Thank you, Heather, for your outstanding service and for making my real estate investment journey a smooth and prosperous one.

Sincerely,
Lisa Li

originalText.text: Been working with Heather for a while and we found the perfect NYC apartment. She was very detail oriented, diligent in the negotiations process. She knows the Manhattan market and we were very lucky to have worked with her as a buyers agent. Thank you Heather for all your hard work !

text.text: Been working with Heather for a while and we found the perfect NYC apartment. She was very detail oriented, diligent in the negotiations process. She knows the Manhattan market and we were very lucky to have worked with her as a buyers agent. Thank you Heather for all your hard work !

originalText.text: Heather helped tremendously with purchasing a condo in Queens (as first-time buyers). She made the experience simple, patiently laying out the process and setting expectations for how long steps would take and what options and decisions there were to make. She connected us with other professionals for lending and insurance who we liked better than the ones we found on our own. Most importantly, Heather helped us deal with some unexpected last-minute problems, advocating for us and making sure the other party properly addressed our concerns - without her, we wouldn't have known what to do!

text.text: Heather helped tremendously with purchasing a condo in Queens (as first-time buyers). She made the experience simple, patiently laying out the process and setting expectations for how long steps would take and what options and decisions there were to make. She connected us with other professionals for lending and insurance who we liked better than the ones we found on our own. Most importantly, Heather helped us deal with some unexpected last-minute problems, advocating for us and making sure the other party properly addressed our concerns - without her, we wouldn't have known what to do!

originalText.text: Heather is a fantastic realtor with amazing energy and dedication to her job. She spent over three months patiently working with us to find the perfect two-bedroom coop on the UES. She showed us over 30 properties, accompanying us to almost all of the showings. Furthermore, as first-generation NYC homeowners, she guided us through the whole process, connecting us with the appropriate people along the way. Heather is extremely responsive, tenacious and dependable. She served as a wonderful advocate for us.

originalText.text:
Finding a right realtor is the most important step in purchasing a house and it’s essential to have a knowledgeable and trustworthy real estate professional to guide you through the difficult process. It was an absolute pleasure working with Heather Cooper.
Throughout  the journey, Heather demonstrated immense patience and made sure I always felt like a priority. Beyond the expertise and professionalism, she was always ready to answer all my questions in-dept explanations, ensured that fully understood the process. I highly recommend Heather to anyone looking for an experienced, reliable and knowledgable professional. I was delighted with her service throughout the entire process of buying my condo.
